titleStmt.title: A Brief account of Captain William Govan, his last speech and prayers, with a miraculous instance after his death, concerning the bleeding of his hedd

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
Filmed with: The humble address of the House of Commons to the King. London : Printed for Edward Jones in the Savoy and Timothy Goodwin at the Queen's Head ..., 1699.
